duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize C-I-CARE framework in all patient interactions to ensure a positive in-office experience.
Perform front of house duties such as check-in/check-out, insurance verification, and tasking to service level expectations.
Contribute to team development through rounding, attending team huddles, participating in team problem solving, and supporting in-office providers.
Master the technology suite including Slack, G-suite, Zoom, and Electronic Medical Record System 1Life.
Perform opening and closing duties and daily office upkeep, including maintaining the look and feel of patient and employee-facing spaces, restocking supplies, and organization.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of experience in high-touch customer or patient-facing roles
